subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers won in Boston and battered Bruins’ defenseman Mark Stuart all game, hitting him in retaliation for his hard, but legal hit against Ranger Ruslan Fedotenko.
snippet: The Rangers won in Boston and battered Bruins’ defenseman Mark Stuart all game, hitting him in retaliation for his hard, but legal hit against Ranger Ruslan Fedotenko.
